translation.Name: Rio Computer - MagRed Weapon #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: After modifying a rifle to shoot pellets instead of bullets, (which is surprisingly difficult) I discovered that actually infusing the pellets with the Z.K.A. is very difficult. So instead, when the gun is fired, a miniscule amount of the Agent is secreted. It's much more efficient then our previous methods and the amount of agent used is just enough to take effect.
